title: Double trouble: Ineos Gen-Z aces Pidcock and Rodríguez on the rise at the Tour de France
content:
Action man Pidcock climbs up the standings, enjoying challenge of racing for GC and exploring limits.

Read the full article at Double trouble: Ineos Gen-Z aces Pidcock and Rodríguez on the rise at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
